description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the seventh course of twenty courses where we will explain the workings of Bernina Software 7.

Explore Step Fill types, settings and stitch angles, as well as what Pull compensation, underlay and stitch density is, and how to manage.

  • Fancy Fill offers choices that will rock your boat
  • Fancy Fill edit options, and Sculpture Fancy Fill.
  • Fancy fill end and beginning of Ripple fill
  • More excitement with Ripple Fill
  • Ripple Fill and more Ripples.
  • Step vs Ripple, what is the difference
  • Contour fill, what is my limitation here?
  • Contour fill vs Fill Stitches, I show you how.
  • Ripple and reshape gives you exiting new ideas in digitizing.
  • Black-work fill stitches, and as outlines and borders
  • Candlewick stitch is not only for hand embroidery
  • Stitch direction as a wave can help for exiting new view

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 20 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software.
title: #07: Bernina Software 7 The Fundamentals of Fill Stitch 2
